revision.text: {{codepointer|Doom|Monster AI}}'''A_Hoof''' {{doomwiki|A_Hoof}} (no parameters) Plays the sound "cyber/hoof" on the BODY channel and calls [[A_Chase]]. == Examples == This example is taken from Doom's [[Classes:Cyberdemon|Cyberdemon]]. See: CYBR A 3 [[A_Hoof]] CYBR ABBCC 3 [[A_Chase]] CYBR D 3 [[A_Metal]] CYBR D 3 loop
